data.message: Fix Duro embedding processing - add synchronous embedding on artifact store: Fixed 2 issues: (1) Added _embed_artifact_sync() helper that embeds immediately on store for facts, decisions, episodes, evaluations. (2) Modified duro_reembed to process embeddings synchronously instead of queuing. Coverage now 100% (555/555). Model loads on demand.
data.task: Fix Duro embedding processing - add synchronous embedding on artifact store
data.outcome: Fixed 2 issues: (1) Added _embed_artifact_sync() helper that embeds immediately on store for facts, decisions, episodes, evaluations. (2) Modified duro_reembed to process embeddings synchronously instead of queuing. Coverage now 100% (555/555). Model loads on demand.
